Text: ENA tradesAs per our conversation yesterday I suggest that we put the two trades that you closed with us in January MW baseload swap year Feb to Jan back on the MTM books and give you simultaneously the opportunity to close these positions Our prices for June Jan swap rates are as follows Argentina power per MWh this is a bidoffer spread in US dollars you are currently long Brazil power R R per MWh this is a bidoffer spread in reais you are currently short We are also making sure that there will be no adverse tax impact for Enron Please let me know if you agree to close these positions Remi
new deal signedteam just signed a month interruptible contract of approximately MW Northeast submarket No MTM but approximately K on accrual basis this year Remi

new power curvesposted new power curves as of today to reflect rationing levels in Southeast use of real transmission constraints between South and Southeast Net impact on DPR will be approximately US positive Remi

PCH deal verbally closed Cc small deal closed Congrats to Marcelo Well book the position once the contract is signed Remi Forwarded by Remi CollongesSAEnron on AM Marcelo Parodi PM To Remi nron David M nron Joao Carlos nron cc Brett R nron Roderick nron Elio nron Karla nron Subject PCH deal verbally closed After one month of negotiations we received today a verbal closing from PCH Salto Lobo under the following conditions plant location Brotas SP CPFL territory power amount up to MW interruptible pricing and term Jan Dec RMWh Jan Dec RMWh delivery point SE center of gravity Salto Lobo pays for TD and we take the T losses Karla since this deal will fall under the nonfirm nonMAE member type of structure Ill take the initiative to fill the draft contract and send you for legal approval I would like to stress the key role that Elio Kumoto played on this deal The deal originally came to Enron through him and Elio actively participated on the negotiation and technical assessment of the plant Rds Marcelo

RE ENA tradesRemi From John J nronXgate on AM CDT To Remi nron cc Subject RE ENA trades Just use mids on the day they were pulled Original Message From Collonges Remi Sent Wednesday May AM To Lavorato John Cc Joe KishkillENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Orlando GonzalezENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject ENA trades John As per our conversation yesterday I suggest that we put the two trades that you closed with us in January MW baseload swap year Feb to Jan back on the MTM books and give you simultaneously the opportunity to close these positions Our prices for June Jan swap rates are as follows Argentina power per MWh this is a bidoffer spread in US dollars you are currently long Brazil power R R per MWh this is a bidoffer spread in reais you are currently short We are also making sure that there will be no adverse tax impact for Enron Please let me know if you agree to close these positions Remi

Re mae measures Cc of the topics I wanted to address PRIORITARILY this afternoon According to Luis Otavio and Fred customers A alta tenso and demand greater than MW will ONLY be allowed to sell excess power not consumed capped at their cota or meta or quota to OTHERS CONSUMERS but not to MARKETERS The reason for this is that ANEELParente dont want to flood MAE with positions to settle the argument is if MAE cannot manage counterparties they wont be able to manage several hundreds But its crazy all unbalanced net positions will be settled in spot market if marketers are not allowed to act as intermediaries there will be hundreds of net bilateral positions to settle and it WILL flood MAE if marketers like Enron can be in the middle they will net themselves all positions on portfolio basis and they will show only ONE position in MAE This mechanism is no different from the often discussed concept of DEMAND SIDE MANAGEMENT The only way to make it work is to allow LIQUIDITY and therefore competition and therefore Marketers It is vital that Marketers be authorized to acquire and sell this power and settle their net position net position only in spot market EOL will be a great tool for this and we may accelerate its launch in Brazil with this new different product Restricted Power Orlando Gonzalez AM To Joe nron Remi nron Brett R nron John nron Jose BestardENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Miguel nron cc John J nronXGate Subject mae measures One of the proposals under review with the Apago team is to allow the B and A costumers to access the Mae and transact their contracted energy after their respective reduction targets The MAE and the distributors do not have the systems in place to deal with over customers in the entire system Elektro alone has close to customers in this class This can be a tremendous oportunity for Enron on Line to take off Remi could you review and prepare an action plan urgently These measures are targeted to be released next week

Re mae measures Cc Please keep me informed as it is key that we know ahead of tome so that we react in time to seize an opportunity if any Remi Fred Sampaio AM To Remi nron cc Orlando nron Joe nron Brett R nron John nron Jose BestardENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Miguel nron John J nronXGate Luis nron Luiz nron David M nron Idel nron Subject Re mae measures Remi Things are changing This issue is still under discussion and the new proposed measures allow consumers to sell to generators distributors and traders If this happens their price is going to raise to MAE price or close to The main issue now is Is MAE goig to start settling Ill keep informing you guys Fred Remi Collonges To Orlando nron cc Joe nron Brett R nron John nron Jose BestardENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Miguel nron John J nronXGate Fred Re May position sold tried all day to sell this volume below Market is extremely illiquid given Annex V uncertainty and other regulatory issues generators believe Parente will help them out in May while LDCs look at their contracts and reduced demand However AES Sul accepted to buy this volume at discount to May spot price payment on June th We will net about R US between sale and purchase prices Credit is OK We will keep a very small long position at MAE settlement for May Remi Luis Berti PM To Remi nron David M nron Ricardo nron Ricardo nron Luis nron Moacyr nron cc Subject May position sold This is to inform that we have closed MWh for May to AES Sul at discount rate against spot price at southeast submarket to be paid on Jun th Berti
Dealweek We just signed a month very small deal MW interruptible RMWh at busbar We signed contracts for past transactions TradenerItambe and AESSul Best regards Remi
